Gozu Tenno was making his way to greet
Amaterasu in order to be selected as one of
the Great Twelve. But when the young girl
who saw him off returned home, she found
a horde of fiends attacking her village!

大群魔兽来袭！

The villagers screamed and ran about wildly
in an attempt to escape. The girl also ran as if
her life depending upon it, but a marauding
fiend managed to catch her. Resigned to death,
she closed her eyes. But at that moment...

村民们惊叫着仓皇逃窜。

但终究还是被魔兽追上了！
就在少女认命地

村民們驚慌慘叫、四處逃竄。
雖然少女也拼了命奔跑，
卻仍然被魔獸追上！

The fiend let out a groan and was knocked
aside! When the girl opened her eyes, she
was astounded to see Gozu Tenno before her.
＂Why is he here?＂ she wondered. ＂Did he
not leave to stand before Amaterasu?＂

少女睁开眼一看，
站在她面前的竟是牛头天王！
可他不是应该已经出发
去天照那里了吗？

魔獸發出一聲痛苦呻吟後被擊飛。
少女睜開雙眼，
在她面前的竟然是牛頭天王！
可是，牛頭天王不是應該
到天照那裡去了嗎……？

＂I heard screaming,＂ explained Gozu Tenno,
＂and could not help but come running back.＂
He then turned to face the entire horde of
fiends all by himself.

「<ruby><rb>人々</rb><rt>ひとびと</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>悲鳴</rb><rt>ひめい</rt></ruby>が<ruby><rb>聞</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>こえ、いてもたっても

独自奋战。

「我聽到人們的慘叫覺得坐立不安，
所以回來了……！」
牛頭天王如此說道，
面對大量魔獸他絲毫不退讓，

The villagers were bewildered. Why was the
man-eating dragon saving their lives? Finally,
the girl screamed out, ＂Gozu Tenno will not
eat you! He is a good and kindly soul!＂

那头食人之龙为什么会救人，

“牛头天王才不是

村民們無不感到疑惑。

這時少女忍不住大喊：
「牛頭天王才不是什麼食人龍族！」

done for her. The villagers doubted her at first,
but seeing the dragon fight for them—and his
wounds that ran red with blood—they finally
started to believe the truth of her words.

起初村民们将信将疑，
但看到伤痕累累的牛头天王后，
他们开始相信少女所言不虚。

少女將牛頭天王其實心地善良，
並且幫助了自己的事告訴村民。
村民們雖然起初半信半疑，
但看著渾身是傷仍然挺身作戰的
牛頭天王，便逐漸相信少女的話。

After Gozu Tenno defeated the last fiend,
the villagers all came before him, thanked him
for his aid, and apologized for their previous
behavior—an action that deeply moved the
kindly dragon.

之后，牛头天王
成功打倒了所有魔兽……
村民们纷纷向他致谢并道歉。
“谢谢你救了我们！”

最後，當牛頭天王
成功打倒了所有魔獸……
村民們紛紛向他道謝與賠罪。
「謝謝你救了我們！」
「過去誤會了你真對不起！」

And while he knew he would never make it to
Amaterasu in time to become one of the Great
Twelve, he had no regrets. So with that,
he turned and began his long walk home.

of the Great Twelve so that he might protect
all of Hinomoto.

無論怎麼趕路，都一定……
就在他煩惱著該怎麼辦時，

Gozu Tenno lumbered into the sky as the girl
shouted words of encouragement—words that
